data.headline: Senior DevOps Engineer
data.summary: Experienced DevOps Engineer with a strong background in infrastructure automation, cloud deployments, and CI/CD pipelines. Adept at leveraging containerization, orchestration, and monitoring tools to improve software delivery and system reliability.

experience.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
bullets: Designed and implemented a cloud-based infrastructure using AWS services, including EC2, S3, and RDS
Automated deployment and configuration management using Terraform, Ansible, and Jenkins
Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines to streamline the software delivery process
Implemented monitoring and observability solutions using Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK stack
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve production issues
Provided technical mentorship and training to junior engineers

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
bullets: Migrated on-premises infrastructure to a hybrid cloud environment using Azure and AWS
Automated the provisioning and configuration of development, staging, and production environments
Implemented containerization and orchestration using Docker and Kubernetes
Designed and maintained CI/CD pipelines to ensure reliable and consistent software deployments
Collaborated with developers to optimize application performance and scalability
Participated in incident response and provided on-call support

experience.title: DevOps Consultant
bullets: Provided DevOps consulting services to early-stage startups
Helped clients set up cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines
Trained developers on best practices for containerization and automation
Optimized application performance and scalability through infrastructure improvements
Participated in the design and implementation of monitoring and alerting systems

projects.name: Cloud Infrastructure Automation
projects.description: Designed and implemented a scalable cloud infrastructure using Terraform, AWS, and Kubernetes. Automated the provisioning and configuration of development, staging, and production environments.

projects.name: CI/CD Pipeline Development
projects.description: Developed and maintained a CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins, GitLab, and Docker. Integrated automated testing, build, and deployment processes to ensure reliable software delivery.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Neutral expression, well-lit, cropped from shoulders up.
